summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3801 for the improvement of the alley in block 11, S.A. Bell's Addition, being the alley between 6th Avenue, Westlake Avenue, and 7th Avenue, from Stewart Street to Virginia Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 46843, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
